description:
Luffy and Ace receive troubling reports of a Celestial attack on Sabo`s ship. Ace is eager to seek out the responsible parties and extract revenge, but a letter from his absent brother tempers his eagerness to fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je compte sur toi ! La lettre d`un frère !
Take Good Care of Him! A Letter from the Brother!
Yoroshiku Tanomu! Kyoudai kara Todoita Tegami!
¡Cuento contigo! La carta de un hermano
Я рассчитываю на вас! Письмо от брата!
اعتن به جيّدًا! رسالة من الأخ!
よろしく頼む! 兄弟から届いた手紙!
